title: ‘The Matrix Resurrections’ and the Wachowski Movie Rankings
description:
‘The Matrix Resurrections’ is out in theaters and streaming on HBO Max. Sean and Amanda talk about the film, the franchise (1:00), and the Wachowskis cinematic experience (43:00). Joining them is Ringer staff writer Rob Mahoney.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Rob Mahoney
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
